statements: UPDATE hydropower_reservoirs SET water_level = 1200.50, electricity_production = 15000.75 WHERE reservoir_id = 1;
UPDATE hydropower_reservoirs SET electricity_production = 17500.25, water_level = 1150.75 WHERE reservoir_id = 2;
UPDATE hydropower_reservoirs SET water_level = 1200.75, electricity_production = 2500000.50 WHERE reservoir_id = 1;
UPDATE hydropower_reservoirs SET electricity_production = 1800000.00, reservoir_name = 'New Reservoir' WHERE water_level < 1000.00;
UPDATE water_flow_levels SET water_level = 100.5, date_time = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE hydropower_reservoir_id = 1;
UPDATE electricity_production SET electricity_output = 750.2, date_time = '2022-01-20 08:45:00' WHERE hydropower_reservoir_id = 2;
UPDATE water_flow_levels SET date_time='2023-11-21 08:00:00', water_level=150.5 WHERE hydropower_reservoir_id=1;
UPDATE electricity_production SET date_time='2023-11-21 10:30:00', electricity_output=300.75 WHERE hydropower_reservoir_id=1;
UPDATE WaterFlowLevels SET water_level = 10.5 WHERE reservoir_id = 1;
UPDATE ProductionOptimization SET electricity_production = 150.25 WHERE reservoir_id = 3 AND timestamp = '2022-04-15 08:30:00';
UPDATE WaterFlowLevels SET water_level = 75.5 WHERE reservoir_id = 1;
UPDATE ProductionOptimization SET electricity_production = 500.0 WHERE reservoir_id = 2 AND timestamp = '2022-12-01 08:00:00';
UPDATE HydropowerReservoir SET water_level = 75.5 WHERE reservoir_id = 1;
UPDATE MaintenanceLogs SET maintenance_description = 'Scheduled maintenance complete' WHERE log_id = 3;
UPDATE HydropowerReservoir SET water_level = water_level + 100 WHERE reservoir_name = 'Smiths Reservoir';
UPDATE ElectricityProduction SET electricity_output = 1500 WHERE production_id = 10;
UPDATE HydropowerReservoirs SET capacity = 1500 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE MaintenanceLogs SET maintenance_description = 'Scheduled maintenance for turbine inspection' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE HydropowerReservoirs SET capacity = 500.25, reservoir_name = 'New Reservoir Name' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE MaintenanceLogs SET maintenance_description = 'Replaced turbine and inspected valves' WHERE reservoir_id = 2 AND maintenance_date = '2022-10-15'
